        Returns:
        the tile url

      • setUrlTemplate

        public void setUrlTemplate(java.lang.String tilesUrl)
        Set a new url template. The url template string to use when fetching tiles. Must have format "prefix{param_1}infix{param_N}suffix", e.g.: "http://tiles.url.com/{floor}/{x}/{y}/{zoom}.png" By default the getTileUrl(int, int, int) method will look for {venueId}/{style}/{buildingId}/{floor}/{z}/{x}/{y}, where x, y and z is mandatory.
        Parameters:
        tilesUrl - The new url template
